summary: Career Overview I am a highly enthusiastic,self motivated, skilled and hardworking customer service oriented professional, seeking a position as a costumer service representative in your company in order to contribute my organization, problem solving and strong communication skills to ensure customer satisfaction.

experience.title: Volunteer Front Desk Receptionist / Canteen Worker
experience.description: Greet visitors and register all blood donors; answer calls and inquiries about blood drives; provide directions to donation areas; check IDs of non-donor visitors; monitor security footage; assist in Canteen work by greeting donors, engaging them in conversation, monitoring for dizziness, fainting, and weakness after donation; maintain up-to-date knowledge of Red Cross donation policies.

experience.title: Musician and Choir Director
experience.description: Direct the choir in the manner of compliments and support the worship agenda for the congregation; select appropriate music for Sunday morning and special services; schedule weekly rehearsals; attend monthly board meetings to maximize church and choir membership.

experience.title: Volunteer Security and Museum Greeter
experience.description: Provide a visual security presence in gallery spaces; make hourly rounds to ensure safety and preservation of art and artifacts; monitor entrance of visiting patrons and maintain daily logs; ensure secure conditions to prevent theft or damage; greet visitors and provide information and directions; assist in set up of special events.

experience.title: Cotton Breeding Lab Technician
experience.description: Prepared and sold broad range of customized merchandise; resolved product issues; described cotton fiber processing; responded to general inquiries via mail, e-mail and fax.

experience.title: Organists Assistant Choir Leader
experience.description: Assist the main choir director in leading worship music for Sunday services and special services; provide musical accompaniment; conduct weekly rehearsals; collaborate to organize and select music for Sundays or special performances; provide information for church bulletin.

experience.title: Student Anatomy & Physiology Laboratory Technician
experience.description: Process and prepare animal tissue samples for student labs; perform routine laboratory tasks; log shipping and receiving orders; perform routine quality control; maintain laboratory safety and cleanliness.

experience.title: Student Chemistry Lab. Technician
experience.description: Set up and prepare class demonstrations; maintain inventories; order and receive stock materials; prepare and dispense chemical materials for lab classes; prepare unknowns for analysis; manage materials loan records.

experience.title: Academic Student Academic Advisor
experience.description: Interacted with instructors to schedule exams; advised students regarding information and academic requirements; assisted students in evaluating abilities and setting goals; prepared advising materials; performed light clerical duties.

experience.title: Casino Shift Security
experience.description: Greet visitors; monitor and guard against illegal activities, theft and vandalism; escort casino funds; respond to emergencies; maintain security logs.

experience.title: Temporary Security Gallery Attendant
experience.description: Patrol assigned galleries; report suspicious activities or medical emergencies; greet patrons; provide information; ensure visitor safety and report any displacement or damage.

experience.title: Front Desk Security
experience.description: Greet visitors, check IDs, issue temporary passes and parking passes; monitor entrances; inspect packages; report irregularities; patrol areas and follow security procedures.

education.degree: Bachelor's Degree in History International Studies
